items.name: Pain Sliver
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Armour items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
2% chance in Heists for Orbs of Transmutation to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
1% chance in Heists for Items to drop fully linked
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
